definition[0]: the period of time that someone rents a house, land etc
definition[1]: the right to use a house, land etc that is rented
definition[2]: an agreement which gives someone the right to use a building, land etc for which they have paid rent
example[2]: The amount of rent you have to pay will depend on the type of tenancy you have.
example[3]: We are applying for a new tenancy of the premises.
definition[3]: the period of time that someone rents a building, land etc
